languages.text: {n}Лицо Джай становится серьезным.{/n} "Прости, но — нет. Мы не приносили клятв над водой, я не обещала держать свое сердце открытым нараспашку перед тобой. У меня есть и будут свое прошлое и своя жизнь, и я не вижу оснований, по которым ты мог{mf||ла} бы претендовать на них. Но я обещаю, что не наврежу тебе своими тайнами".

{n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Джай становится серьезным.{/n} "Прости, но — нет. Мы не приносили клятв над водой, я не обещала держать свое сердце открытым нараспашку перед тобой. У меня есть и будут свое прошлое и своя жизнь, и я не вижу оснований, по которым ты мог{mf||ла} бы претендовать на них. Но я обещаю, что не наврежу тебе своими тайнами".

I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

{n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promise to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

{n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promise to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

languages.text: {n}Jae se vuelve seria.{/n} «Lo siento, pero no. No hemos prestado juramento sobre agua ni he prometido que mi corazón será un libro abierto. Siempre tendré mi propia vida y mi propio pasado y no veo razón para que los posea. Sí le prometo que mis secretos nunca le harán daño».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se vuelve seria.{/n} «Lo siento, pero no. No hemos prestado juramento sobre agua ni he prometido que mi corazón será un libro abierto. Siempre tendré mi propia vida y mi propio pasado y no veo razón para que los posea. Sí le prometo que mis secretos nunca le harán daño».

languages.text: {n}婕伊的脸色变得严肃起来。{/n}“抱歉，不行。我们从未在水面上许下过誓言，我也从未承诺过会在你面前敞开心扉。我有自己的过去和人生，而且这些东西只属于我，我认为你没有理由了解这些。不过我可以保证，我的秘密绝对不会对你造成伤害。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的脸色变得严肃起来。{/n}“抱歉，不行。我们从未在水面上许下过誓言，我也从未承诺过会在你面前敞开心扉。我有自己的过去和人生，而且这些东西只属于我，我认为你没有理由了解这些。不过我可以保证，我的秘密绝对不会对你造成伤害。”
{n}婕伊的脸色变得严肃起来。{/n}“抱歉，不行。我们从未在水面上许下过誓言，我也从未承诺过会在你面前敞开心扉。我有自己的过去和人生，而且这些东西只属于我，我认为你没有理由了解这些。不过我可以保证，我的秘密绝对不会对你造成伤害。”

languages.text: {n}ジェイの顔が真剣な表情に変わる。{/n}「悪いけどその約束はできないよ。変わりゆくものに誓いを立てることはないし、あんたにいつでも心を開くって約束もしない。あたしにはいつも、これからも、自分自身の過去と人生があるし、あんたにその拠り所になってもらういわれもない。だけどあたしの秘密があんたを傷つけることは決してないよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの顔が真剣な表情に変わる。{/n}「悪いけどその約束はできないよ。変わりゆくものに誓いを立てることはないし、あんたにいつでも心を開くって約束もしない。あたしにはいつも、これからも、自分自身の過去と人生があるし、あんたにその拠り所になってもらういわれもない。だけどあたしの秘密があんたを傷つけることは決してないよ」
{n}ジェイの顔が真剣な表情に変わる。{/n}「悪いけどその約束はできないよ。変わりゆくものに誓いを立てることはないし、アンタにいつでも心を開くって約束もしない。アタシにはいつも、これからも、自分自身の過去と人生があるし、アンタにその拠り所になってもらういわれもない。だけどアタシの秘密がアンタを傷つけることは決してないよ」

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Jae s'assombrit{/n} « Je regrette, mais c'est non. Nous n'avons pas prononcé nos vœux sur l'eau, et je n'ai jamais promis de vous laisser lire dans mon cœur comme dans un livre ouvert. Mon passé et mon avenir n'appartiennent qu'à moi, et je ne vois pas pourquoi je remettrais ma vie entre vos mains. En revanche, je vous promets que vous n'aurez jamais à souffrir de mes petits secrets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Jae s'assombrit{/n} « Je regrette, mais c'est non. Nous n'avons pas prononcé nos vœux sur l'eau, et je n'ai jamais promis de vous laisser lire dans mon cœur comme dans un livre ouvert. Mon passé et mon avenir n'appartiennent qu'à moi, et je ne vois pas pourquoi je remettrais ma vie entre vos mains. En revanche, je vous promets que vous n'aurez jamais à souffrir de mes petits secrets. »

languages.text: {n}Jaes Miene wird ernst.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, aber nein. Wir haben kein Gelübde über Wasser geleistet, und ich habe nie versprochen, mein Herz weit für Euch geöffnet zu lassen. Ich habe meine eigene Vergangenheit und mein eigenes Leben und werde sie auch immer haben, und ich sehe keinen Grund, warum Ihr sie für Euch beanspruchen solltet. Doch ich verspreche Euch, dass meine Geheimnisse Euch niemals schaden werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

Ich habe meine eigene Vergangenheit und mein eigenes Leben und werde sie auch immer haben, und ich sehe keinen Grund, warum Ihr sie für Euch beanspruchen solltet. Doch ich verspreche Euch, dass meine Geheimnisse Euch niemals schaden werden."

Ich habe meine eigene Vergangenheit und mein eigenes Leben und werde sie auch immer haben, und ich sehe keinen Grund, warum Ihr sie für Euch beanspruchen solltet. Doch ich verspreche Euch, dass meine Geheimnisse Euch niemals schaden werden."

languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promise to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın yüzü ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm ama hayır. Birbirimize deniz kıyısında romantik yeminler etmedik ve sana hiçbir zaman kalbimi tamamen açacağımın sözünü vermedim. Geçmişim ve hayatım bana ait, öyle de kalacak. Onlar üzerinde söz hakkın olması için bir sebep görmüyorum. Ancak sırlarımın sana zarar getirmeyeceğine söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's face turns serious.{/n} "Sorry, but no. We have made no vows over water, and I never made any promises to keep my heart open wide before you. I have and always will have my own past and my own life, and I see no reason why you should lay claim to them. But I do promise that my secrets will never cause you harm."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın yüzü ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm ama hayır. Birbirimize deniz kıyısında romantik yeminler etmedik ve sana hiçbir zaman kalbimi tamamen açacağımın sözünü vermedim. Geçmişim ve hayatım bana ait ve öyle de kalacak. Senin onlar üzerinde söz hakkın olması için bir sebep görmüyorum. Sırlarımın sana zarar getirmeyeceği konusunda söz veriyorum ama."
